mapper.select: SELECT members.id, members.nick_name, max(events.date) as d FROM members INNER JOIN attendees ON members.id = attendees.member_id INNER JOIN events ON attendees.event_id = events.id GROUP BY members.id, members.nick_name ORDER BY d DESC
SELECT * FROM members ORDER BY members.id

SELECT members.nick_name AS name, count(events.id) AS numAttendees, sum(CASE WHEN events.type = 'オーシャンリーグ' OR events.type = '練習試合' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS numGames, sum(CASE WHEN events.type = '練習' OR events.type = '合宿' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS numPractices FROM members INNER JOIN attendees ON members.id = attendees.member_id INNER JOIN events ON attendees.event_id = events.id WHERE events.date >= #{begin} AND events.date <= #{end} AND members.status = 1 GROUP BY members.id ORDER BY numAttendees DESC
